title: 7_62_perezaryadka _(RUS)
description:
Samostoyatel&#039;noe dopolnenie k takticheskomu boeviku "7.62" sostavili dvenadtsat&#039; novih missiy, svyazannih edinoy syuzhetnoy liniey. V nebol&#039;shoy latinoamerikanskoy strane posle porazheniya mestnogo diktatora Al&#039;varo Defensi v grazhdanskoy voyne slozhilas&#039; ves&#039;ma napryazhennaya obstanovka. Nesmotrya na zaklyuchennoe soglashenie o prekraschenii ognya, po vsey granitse prodolzhayutsya stichki. Za razvitiem sobitiy nablyudaet tret&#039;ya sila, kotoruyu ne ustraivayut tempi dobichi nefti i proizvodstva narkotikov v etom regione. Glavnomu geroyu ÃƒÂ¢?? naemniku-professionalu Migelyu Garsia predstoit sobrat&#039; boevoy otryad, razobrat&#039;sya v hitrospleteniyah intrig i sdelat&#039; svoy sobstvenniy vibor.


Translated from Google
Self addition to the tactical fighter "7.62" was twelve new missions involving single story line. In a small Latin American country after the defeat of the local dictator Alvaro Defensy in the civil war, a very tense situation. Despite the agreement on a cease-fire in all the border clashes are continuing. For watching developments third force, which is not satisfied with the pace of oil and the production of drugs in the region. Home hero - mercenary, a Professional Miguel Garcia to collect military detachment, to understand the intricacies and intrigue to make their own choices.
